title: $705+ R/T Brazil Flights on Tam
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $705+ R/T Brazil Flights on Tam $705+ R/T Brazil Flights on Tam September 15, 2015 9:29pm   Tweet 
Tam's Brazil sale is discounting Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo flights from $705 round-trip with departures available from both Miami and New York City. Tickets include taxes and fees. 
All travel must commence by December 18, but purchased by September 22. The minimum stay is five days or a Sunday, the maximum is 12 months. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Decent pricing on oft-expensive destinations. Cons: Available from only two U.S. cities. Verdict: Solid offer, though only for Miami and NYC travelers. SEARCH FOR THIS DEAL!
